description: An aquarium-like vessel designed and operated by Breed to house and display his collection of enslaved sea creatures and animals. The ship features large glass tanks and compartments for containing various marine life.

statusHistory.description: Operated by Breed as a mobile aquarium prison for enslaved creatures

keyEvents.title: Law Reveals Breed's Weakness
keyEvents.description: Law explains the weakness of Breed's Devil Fruit power aboard the ship.

keyEvents.title: Breed's Self-Enhancement
keyEvents.description: Breed uses his Devil Fruit on himself within his ship, losing control of the enslaved animals.

keyEvents.title: Final Battle Against Breed
keyEvents.description: Luffy and the Kung-fu Dugong defeat Breed on his ship, freeing all enslaved animals.

features: Large glass tanks for sea creatures

defenses: Enslaved sea creatures under Breed's control
trivia: The ship's aquarium design reflects Breed's obsession with collecting and displaying 'pets'.
The vessel is only seen in the anime-original Caesar Retrieval Arc filler.
After Breed's defeat, it's unclear what happened to the ship.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using wood from the legendary Adam Tree. A brigantine-style ship with a sun-themed design.

keyEvents.title: News of Doflamingo's Resignation
keyEvents.description: The crew aboard the Thousand Sunny receives shocking news via newspaper about Doflamingo's resignation from the Shichibukai.
